title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Design Education Program Improvement Through Collaborative Action Research

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose three or more issues in existing design education programs by applying action research methodologies
Students can propose at least two improvement plans for design education based on peer feedback in a collaborative learning environment.
Students can develop at least one prototype of a design education program using a smartphone-based LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
